sys_ui_message.message:
Leave encashment is your accumulated leave balance available. All permanent employees qualify to encash up to 12 days of accumulated leave per year.
Here is how you can go about making your leave encashment request:
- Type ‘Create Request’ in the Workday Search field - Select ‘Leave Encashment’ from the list appearing - Fill in the questionnaire, ie. number of days - Click on Submit
Please note that leave encashment successfully submitted on Workday by the payroll cut off date - which is the 10th of every month - is paid in the current month's pay run.
